page.title: 20LIVING IN OAKAMOOR
page.content: There is little employment in Oakamoor and people travel to Bolton's at Froghall,Britsh Industrial Sand,JCB at Rocester or into the Potteries or Leek. People must travel to Alton or Cheadle to visit a doctor.There is a butcher's shop,a general store,a Post Office and a Blacksmith.Newspapers are delivered. People travel to Cheadle or further for most of their shopping.There is our village school but older children travel to Cheadle to Secondary school. The Picnic Area attracts many visitors and canoeists hold events on the river. The Admiral Jervis offers bed and break -fast and a licensed restaurant and this year barn accomodation and tea rooms have opened.Alton Towers traffic is routed through the village. THE VALLEY PRIMARY SCHOOL OAKAMOOR BLOCK 04040345 WITH HELP FROM ST JOHN'S PRIMARY ALTON
